pages.title: Coarse Iron Grit
pages.text: A rough, chunky Iron Ore dust that can be smelted to $(n)Iron Ingots$(), but is not much of use for advanced processing. It is obtained by the $(o)Ore Crushing Hammer$().$(br2) $(br)$(o)[This is an item that is only used / activated if no other mod provides Iron Dust.]

pages.title: Coarse Gold Grit
pages.text: A rough, chunky Gold Ore dust that can be smelted to $(n)Gold Ingots$(), but is not much of use for advanced processing. It is obtained by the $(o)Ore Crushing Hammer$().$(br2)$(o)[This is an item that is only used / activated if no other mod provides Gold Dust.] Yes, I copied the text.
